casebody.data:
THE KNIGHT PUBLISHING CO. d/b/a the Charlotte Observer
v.
THE CHARLOTTE-MECKLENBURG HOSPITAL AUTHORITY d/b/a Carolinas Healthcare System. No. 549P05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 1, 2005. Mark J. Prak, Marcus W. Trathen, Charles E. Coble, Raleigh, for the Charlotte Observer. Mark W. Merritt, Blake W. Thomas, Charlotte, for Charlotte Hospital. Linwood L. Jones, General Counsel, Raleigh, for NC Hospital Assoc.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 21st day of September 2005 by Plaintiff in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 1st day of December 2005."
